wordGroup: respiratory failure 呼吸衰竭；呼吸衰弱
severe acute respiratory syndrome 严重急性呼吸系统综合症
upper respiratory tract 上呼吸道

upper respiratory tract infection 上呼吸道感染
respiratory syncytial virus 呼吸道合胞体病毒

sentences.en: Smoking places you at serious risk of cardiovascular and respiratory disease.
sentences.cn: 吸烟会严重增加罹患心血管和呼吸道疾病的风险。

sentences.en: Other respiratory regulating mechanisms apparently cease functioning during sleep.
sentences.cn: 其他呼吸调节机制显然在睡眠期间停止运行了。
